title: Currently Untitled
content:
This is a new font, my second attempt. This is my first try at lowercase though.   
I wanted to blend a formal script and a casual brush to create something for my upcoming wedding. I just scetched out a few letters, and I know that some need work.   
Please feel free to add suggestions. Thanks!   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021043im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10857.gif)
author: matthewj
